https://tmrev.io/movie/432138-A Big Lego Christmas 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/43agBDSVDOxiQkNXWMnTAQEgbxh.jpg A look behind the scenes as the world's most profitable toy maker opens its biggest ever Lego store, in London. Designer Justin's first ever kit finally hits the shelves, and Lego pro Duncan prepares to make the largest model ever - a replica of Tower Bridge. A Big Lego Christmas
